# EditorExportPlatformAppleEmbedded

**Inherits:** [EditorExportPlatform](class_editorexportplatform.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

**Inherited By:** [EditorExportPlatformIOS](class_editorexportplatformios.md), [EditorExportPlatformVisionOS](class_editorexportplatformvisionos.md)

Base class for the Apple embedded platform exporters (iOS and visionOS).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

The base class for Apple embedded platform exporters. These include iOS and visionOS, but not macOS. See the classes inheriting from this one for more details.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->
